statements: UPDATE SupplierInventory SET current_inventory = current_inventory - 10 WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE SupplierInventory SET current_inventory = 50, reorder_threshold = 20 WHERE supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE SupplierInventory SET current_inventory = current_inventory + 10, reorder_threshold = 50 WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND product_id = 100;
UPDATE SupplierInventory SET product_name = 'New Product Name', current_inventory = 20, reorder_threshold = 30 WHERE supplier_id = 2 AND product_id = 200;
UPDATE supplier_inventory SET current_quantity = 50, reorder_threshold = 20 WHERE supplier_id = 1
UPDATE reorder_alerts SET alert_message = 'Low stock, please reorder' WHERE alert_id = 3

UPDATE reorder_alerts SET alert_message = 'Low Stock Alert - Please Reorder' WHERE supplier_id = 150 AND product_id = 250;
UPDATE supplier SET email = 'newemail@example.com', supplier_name = 'New Supplier' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity_in_stock = 100, threshold_quantity = 20 WHERE product_id = 5 AND supplier_id = 2;
UPDATE supplier SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier Name', contact_person = 'New Contact Person' WHERE supplier_id = 1;
